-- | render hastache templates using aeson values
--   
--   The Module lets you render Hastache templates from aeson values. See
--   the GitHub page for examples.
@package hastache-aeson
@version 0.1.0.0

module Text.Hastache.Aeson
jsonValueContext :: Monad m => Value -> MuContext m
